issue.title: add signal whenever sim time is updated

content.raw:
the problem we have seen is that most controller will have their own process or thread, though the model plugin might be connected to either WorldUpdateStart or WorldUpdateEnd, but the actual sim time update happens somewhere in the middle of the two.  There is then a race condition for the sim time value between when the model plugin updates and when the controller thread/process updates.   This race condition induces a time step size jitter in time offset between stamped state time produced at the model plugin level and the sim time when the controller actually receives the state update.

Hope that makes sense.
